description: Learn how to train a custom tagger to classify text using scikit-learn, with practical tuning advice to get more accurate results. See how to create a REST API to train and host your tagger using AWS services including Lambda, API Gateway and Step Functions. Gather tips on how to overcome limitations in AWS and scikit-learn when creating your own custom tagger.
title: How to Train Your Classifier: Create a Serverless Machine Learning System with AWS and scikit-learn
